entry.title: Friday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 4 this afternoon. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
